description:
This 'Beginners Introduction' into the world of Audio Podcasting, is a course designed to teach you the fundamentals of podcasting so that you feel confident enough to produce your very own podcast.

I share tried and tested techniques with you, to help give you an edge over the competition!

In this course we will cover the following:

  • Introduction to Audio Podcasting,
  • Getting familiar with equipment and a recording environment,
  • Vocal training and best practices,
  • Setting up required equipment,
  • Familiarising yourself with recording techniques,
  • Editing and producing your podcast,
  • Publishing, uploading and distributing your podcast,
  • Tips on self-promotion and making a name for yourself.

All of these methods have been learnt through self-experience, training and advice from industry associates.

Everything you need to know to get started with audio podcasting and more - in one convenient 14 lecture Udemy course!
title: Getting Started with Audio Podcasting (Beginners Guide)
